section.p: The components. properties, and relationships that this ZenPack discovers and updates during modeling. Discovery and modeling are enabled by specifying server addresses, usernames, and passwords.

dlentry.dd: Attributes: Name, Contact, Description, Serial Number, Tag, Hardware Model, Total Memory, Total Swap, Operating System, Cluster
